Notes: Handles spawning and respawning of Yoshi eggs.

Obj_arg0.Name: Start Empty
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, only the nest will be shown at the start of the level. If another Yoshi returns to it's egg, this nest will become availible to use as a respawn point for Yoshi.

SW_A.Description: If set, the player will be unable to break open the egg until the switch is activated.
